import React from "react"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { products } from "../data/products"; // get id and close event interface CheckInfoProductProps { onCheck: () => void id: number } //Create template modal export function InfoProduct({onCheck, id}: CheckInfoProductProps){ const closeHandler = (event: React.MouseEvent) => { event.preventDefault() onCheck() } return ( <>
Previous Next

Названия: {products[id].title}

Описания: {products[id].description}

Цена: {products[id].price} ₽

) }
